references.paper_title: Objaverse: A universe of annotated 3d objects
references.reason: This paper provides the Objaverse dataset, a crucial resource for training and evaluating the X-Ray model's 3D object generation capabilities.

references.paper_title: Stable video diffusion: Scaling latent video diffusion models to large datasets
references.reason: This is the foundation of the X-Ray model, providing the architecture and training strategy for the video diffusion model used to generate sequential surface frames.

references.paper_title: Taming transformers for high-resolution image synthesis
references.reason: This paper introduces the transformer-based architecture that is incorporated into the X-Ray diffusion model and improves the quality of 3D object generation.
This paper provides the algorithm for converting the point cloud generated from the X-Ray representation into a 3D mesh, a crucial step in the X-Ray decoding process.

references.paper_title: Nerf: Representing scenes as neural radiance fields for view synthesis
references.reason: This paper is a foundational work in Neural Radiance Fields, providing background on the implicit function approaches that are contrasted and improved by the X-Ray method.
